name: Community Revitalization Counseling
description: Through the Community Revitalization Program, ASIAN, Inc. effectively acquires, manages, rehabilitates, and sells foreclosed property. The purposes of this program are as follow: - Reduce and prevent neighborhood blight - Correct conditions that threaten the health, safety and welfare of the public - Promote neighborhood stability and residential owner occupancy by preserving the condition and appearance of residential properties - Maintain residential property values and assessments - Increase
